alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Menominee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 8:55PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lincoln, Marathon, northwestern Menominee, southern Langlade and western Shawano Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 855 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Antigo to near Colby. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wausau, Antigo, Marshfield, Weston, Rib Mountain, Mosinee, Spencer, Wittenberg, White Lake and Neopit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central, north central and northeastern Wisconsin.
